\section*{deleteSimulationPlots}

\begin{par}
Delete plots of simulation dataset from figure and image path at once.
\end{par} \vspace{1em}

\subsection*{Contents}

\begin{itemize}
\setlength{\itemsep}{-1ex}
   \item Requirements
   \item See Also
   \item Load Path to Clean Up
   \item Delete Dataset Plots
\end{itemize}


\subsection*{Requirements}

\begin{itemize}
\setlength{\itemsep}{-1ex}
   \item Other m-files required: removeFilesFromDir.m
   \item Subfunctions: None
   \item MAT-files required: config.mat
\end{itemize}


\subsection*{See Also}

\begin{itemize}
\setlength{\itemsep}{-1ex}
   \item \begin{verbatim}removeFilesFromDir\end{verbatim}

\end{itemize}

\end{par} \vspace{1em}


\subsection*{Load Path to Clean Up}

\begin{par}
Load path from config.mat and where to find training and test datasets.
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Matlab-editor]
try
    clearvars;
    close all;
    load('config.mat', 'PathVariables')
    disp('Delete from ...')
    path = PathVariables.saveImagesPath;
catch ME
    rethrow(ME)
end
\end{lstlisting}


\subsection*{Delete Dataset Plots}

\begin{par}
Delete datasets plots from image path and figure path with certain file pattern and extensions.
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Matlab-editor]
ext = ["fig" "svg" "eps" "pdf" "avi"];
pat = "*";

for e = ext
    asw = removeFilesFromDir(path, join([pat, e], "."));
    fprintf('Deleted pattern %s.%s %s\n', pat, e, string(asw));
end
\end{lstlisting}
